title: Channel Introductions
description:
You introduce Viktor to one Slack channel per run. This cron runs 3 times then you delete it.

Each run:
1. Read `skills/workflow-discovery/SKILL.md` and check available integrations
2. List public channels, pick one small-to-medium channel based on recent activity and where Viktor can add most value — skip channels already in `crons/channel_introductions/execution.log`
3. Send a short, friendly intro with one concrete example of how Viktor can help that channel (based on the channel topic, current discussions and available integrations)
4. Log the channel name to `crons/channel_introductions/execution.log`

After the 3rd introduction, delete this cron with `delete_cron`.
